name: Chicago Bulls New Era Snapback - Grey/Red
description:
Brand new Chicago Bulls snapback made by New Era with stickers intact. This hat is grey in colour with red detailing, red bill and green underbill with Bulls logo/text on the front and logo on side plus the New Era logo on the opposite side.

Since 1920, New Era has been the world's premier headwear brand, producing quality caps for all Major League Baseball Teams as well as numerous NBA Teams and other collaborations.

name: Charlotte Hornets New Era Snapback
description:
Brand new Charlotte Hornets snapback made by New Era with stickers intact. This hat is aqua and purple in colour with a green underbill plus Hornets logo on the front and the New Era logo on the side. The purple text across the front reading "Hornets" is 3D effect wool-like material. 

Since 1920, New Era has been the world's premier headwear brand, producing quality caps for all Major League Baseball Teams as well as numerous NBA Teams and other collaborations.
